name: 约翰·亚当斯
bio: 美国第2任总统，独立运动的核心推动者。在大陆会议上力主独立，推荐杰斐逊起草《独立宣言》。任总统期间通过争议性的《外侨与煽动法》，在与法国的准战争中保持克制，避免全面冲突。他与杰斐逊先为盟友、后为政敌、终为挚友——两人在1826年7月4日同一天去世，恰逢独立宣言发表50周年。
bio_en: Second President of the United States and a leading advocate for independence. As a Massachusetts delegate, he nominated Washington as Commander-in-Chief and championed the Declaration of Independence. His presidency was marked by the Alien and Sedition Acts and the avoidance of war with France.

personalEvents.title: 辩护英军士兵
personalEvents.description: 在波士顿惨案后为英军士兵辩护，捍卫法治原则
personalEvents.description_en: Defended British soldiers after the Boston Massacre, upholding the principle of rule of law

personalEvents.title: 推动独立宣言
personalEvents.description: 在大陆会议上成为独立最强有力的倡导者
personalEvents.description_en: Became the most forceful advocate for independence at the Continental Congress

personalEvents.title: 当选首任副总统
personalEvents.description: 成为华盛顿的副总统，称此职为'最无用的职位'
personalEvents.description_en: Became Washington's Vice President, calling it 'the most insignificant office'

personalEvents.title: 就任第二任总统
personalEvents.description: 继华盛顿之后成为总统，面对与法国的外交危机
personalEvents.description_en: Succeeded Washington as President, facing a diplomatic crisis with France

personalEvents.title: 签署《外侨与煽动法》
personalEvents.description: 限制移民和言论自由，引发第一次宪法权利大辩论
personalEvents.description_en: Restricted immigration and free speech, sparking the first major debate over constitutional rights
